about:
Front-End Developer with a Bachelor of Computer Science degree, I live in Brazil but one day I still want to move to Canada!

I have been working with Web Development since 2013, I have also worked with Back-End but today my focus is Front-End using technologies such as React.js, Redux, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, PHP, Node.js and others.

During this period I was able to participate in several projects, get involved in the methodology of great teams and share my knowledge with colleagues in the area.

I also like to keep myself updated and connected with the development community in general, going to events, participating in groups or even following the professionals and companies that stand out.

So I always try to keep this page up to date so that people can also know a little about me!

experiences.title: Senior Front-End Developer
experiences.about: Acting remotely as a senior front-end developer dealing directly with the development and structure of the website applications, freight quote pages, order dashboard and other internal projects, as well as back-end integration, unit testing and end-to- end.
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Javascript, React, Redux, Styled-Components, Jest, Enzyme, Cypress, REST API, GIT, Continuous Delivery, Continuous Integration, Bitbucket Pipelines, End-to-End Tests, Unit Tests, Scrum.

experiences.title: Lead Front-End Developer
experiences.about: Development of web applications with React and integration of data with the Back-End via API Rest. Project structure and organization of the front-end team.
experiences.skills: Team leader, Scrum, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React, Redux, Styled-Components, SASS, Node.js, Git, REST API, Cypress E2E Tests.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
experiences.about: Front-end development of reusable components with React and Typescript. Study and implementation of mockups. Data integration with Back-End using GraphQL and ApolloClient.
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React, Redux, Typescript, SASS, Material Ui, Node.js, Heroku, Git, Unit Testing, GraphQL, Prototyping, Mockups, Figma, Invision.

experiences.title: Front-End Developer
experiences.about: Front-end development for e-commerce and its in-house projects, streaming UX / UI jobs to improve store performance, usability, and conversion. Performance in multidisciplinary squads with results measured through KPIs and OKRs.
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, PHP, Javascript, React, Redux, Styled-Components, SASS,  Next.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Lambda, Serverless, GIT, Docker, Continuous  Delivery, Pipelines, End-to-End Testing, A/B Testing, UX.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.about: Development of institutional websites, e-commerces and web systems using HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, PHP and MySQL. Responsive and mobile first design. Performance and page optimization.
experiences.skills: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, PHP, Wordpress, MySql, Responsive Design, Mobile First, Cross-Browser, SEO.

experiences.title: IT Trainee
experiences.about: IT support for office users. Feeding internal systems to monitor transaction data and services captured through webservice. Development and maintenance of intranet site.

academic.title: Computer Science
academic.about: The development of a Home Automation System was presented, as a course conclusion work, using Arduino to control the components of the residence through a web interface available for computers, cell phones or any device with internet access.
academic.skills: Arduíno, C, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, PHP, Apache.
